verses.name: Job 36:7
verses.text: He withdraweth not his eyes from the righteous: but with kings are they on the throne; yea, he doth establish them for ever, and they are exalted.

verses.name: Job 36:8
verses.text: And if they be bound in fetters, and be holden in cords of affliction;

verses.name: Job 36:9
verses.text: Then he sheweth them their work, and their transgressions that they have exceeded.

verses.name: Job 36:10
verses.text: He openeth also their ear to discipline, and commandeth that they return from iniquity.

verses.name: Job 36:11
verses.text: If they obey and serve him, they shall spend their days in prosperity, and their years in pleasures.
